meanings.definition: Spread or smear (a substance) thinly over a surface.
meanings.sent1: She shmeers butter on her toast every morning.
meanings.sent2: He shmeers paint on the canvas to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The chef shmeers sauce on the pasta with precision.
meanings.sent4: The artist shmeers colors together to blend them seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The gardener shmeers fertilizer on the soil for healthy plants.

meanings.sent1: There was a shmeers of frosting on the cake.
meanings.sent2: The car had a shmeers of dust on its windshield.
meanings.sent3: She added a shmeers of glitter to the craft project.
meanings.sent4: The lake reflected the sky like a shmeers of glass.
meanings.sent5: The sandwich had a shmeers of mayo for extra flavor.
